name: DustOff
description:
Dust Off Genie Battle Cleaner

This is a fast-paced spell-fighting game for up to four players. Everyone takes over a genie and immerses themselves in a palace that has been ravaged by a sandstorm. In this arena, players battle by collecting scattered sand and casting sand spells to disrupt their opponents. Dust Off the most to win your genie eternal freedom. We invite you to join this top-down free-for-all battle to become the best genie cleaner and entertain the Sultan on his balcony.


Created for the Game Lab Course at ETH Zurich over the span of 3 months.

Framework MonoGame was used for development.

Available for Windows.

Credits for music and fonts are from free licenses.
